templates.subject: Incident Report: {{INCIDENT_NAME}} - Root Cause and Remediation
templates.body:
Dear Valued Customer,

We are writing to provide a detailed report on the incident that affected our service on {{START_TIME}}.

**INCIDENT SUMMARY**

**What Happened:**
{{IMPACT_SUMMARY}}

**Timeline:**
- Incident began: {{START_TIME}}
- Incident detected: [Detection time]
- Mitigation started: [Mitigation time]
- Service restored: [Resolution time]
- Total duration: [Duration]

**Customer Impact:**
- Affected customers: {{CUSTOMERS_AFFECTED}}
- Services impacted: [List]
- Geographic regions: [List]

**ROOT CAUSE ANALYSIS**

**What Caused This:**
{{ROOT_CAUSE}}

**Why It Happened:**
[Detailed explanation of the underlying cause]

**Why Our Safeguards Didn't Prevent It:**
[Honest assessment of what should have caught this]

**REMEDIATION ACTIONS**

**Immediate Fixes (Completed):**
- [Action 1 with completion date]
- [Action 2 with completion date]
- [Action 3 with completion date]

**Short-term Improvements (In Progress):**
- [Action 1 with target date]
- [Action 2 with target date]
- [Action 3 with target date]

**Long-term Enhancements (Planned):**
- [Strategic improvement 1 with timeline]
- [Strategic improvement 2 with timeline]
- [Strategic improvement 3 with timeline]

**WHAT WE'RE DOING TO PREVENT RECURRENCE**

**Technical Improvements:**
- [Specific technical changes]
- [Monitoring enhancements]
- [Architecture improvements]

**Process Improvements:**
- [Updated procedures]
- [Enhanced testing]
- [Improved incident response]

**Organizational Changes:**
- [Team structure changes if applicable]
- [Training initiatives]
- [Communication improvements]

**YOUR ACCOUNT**

As a result of this incident:
- [SLA credits applied, if applicable]
- [Data integrity verified - no data loss]
- [Security assessment completed - no breach]
- [Compensation or goodwill gesture, if applicable]

**COMMITMENT TO YOU**

We take full responsibility for this incident. We understand the impact it had on your business and your trust in us. We are committed to:

- Transparency in our communications
- Continuous improvement of our systems
- Earning back your confidence
- Preventing similar incidents

**QUESTIONS OR CONCERNS?**

Our leadership team is available to discuss this incident:
- Email: {{CONTACT_POINT}}
- Phone: [Executive support line]
- Schedule a call: [Calendly link]

We will also be hosting a customer webinar on [DATE] to answer questions and discuss our improvements. Register here: [LINK]

**DETAILED TECHNICAL REPORT**

For customers who want more technical details, we've prepared an extended report: [LINK]

Thank you for your patience and continued partnership.

Sincerely,

[Executive Name]
[Title - CEO/CTO/COO]
[Company Name]
